page.title: 06Amenities in Treviscoe
page.content: There is concern in the village of{ {Treviscoe}about possible decline of the village due to loss of amenities. The{village shop/post office}closed for several months in 1984 causing great concern. For a good number of years the{school} has been under threat of closure.The opening of a new school building in St. Stephen prompted the County to suggest closure at public meetings in 1983 and 1985.Strong opposition from the community caused the plan to be put aside.Parents would like to see the school provided with indoor toilets.A plan for this has had to be postponed for financial reasons. The public{bus service}is infrequent and there has been discussion on the possibility of operating a{community {bus.}
